Name: Tower of Mice
About the game: Take the role as Ria in this action RPG adventure. Play randomized levels in this six chapter adventure in both night and day-time. Fight enemies and solve puzzels to reach The Tower. Travel in open levels and strategically choose your battles with monsters in closed off arenas. Face them in the forest and their own world called The Void. Gain experience and spend points on new magical abilities found as random tomes in the forest. Collect tokens and spend them on useful items to facilitate your adventure. Undercover the truth about the forest Abberon and try open the gates to The Tower.
